Find the perfect plan for your business

The rates are discussed and negotiated upon consultation. Consultation usually means waiting to find out that the service is over-priced and without much support. Not the case with us. We are reasonably and competitively priced. And, you don’t have to worry about installing any software or maintenance – we do all of that. All you have to do is pay for what you use, which usually ends up being around 20 bucks a court per month. We recommend installations in increments of 6 months. All of this allows you to be more flexible, which ultimately results in a very satisfied customer.

Pricing FAQ

What types of payment do you accept?
Credit cards including MasterCard, Visa or American Express.
Can I change my plan at a later time?
Yes, you can upgrade and downgrade your plan at anytime.
Do you offer pricing for nonprofit organizations?
Yes, send us a message and we'll set you up on our nonprofit pricing.
Questions?
Contact us for any further questions at sales@sportsynergy.net.
